title: CMC-Based Elementary Foreign Language Collaborative Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language comprehension (greetings, daily conversations, etc.)
context.additional_context: Beginner Italian course for in-service elementary school teachers, combining offline classes with CMC (Computer-Mediated Communication) activities using digital devices (tablets/laptops).

learning_goals: With over 80% accuracy, learners can write topic-specific opinions on online discussion boards using the target language (Italian).
Through CMC collaboration with peer learners, learners can interpret and summarize over 70% of provided text materials.
Over 16 weeks, learners participate in at least three multi-forum activities (role-play, feedback, open discussion) and achieve a 20% increase in language confidence index.

resources: Beginner Italian textbooks and cultural materials

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
